DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness of bacteria called Lactobacillus GG, a Probiotic, in preventing the growth of resistant bacteria in the digestive tract in patients on a ventilator.
DOC.brief_title: The Use of Probiotics to Evaluate Colonization With Antimicrobial Resistant Bacteria
